name: Best LD Game Ever!
description:
THE BEST LD GAME EVER! Set on an adventure to create the best Ludum Dare video game of all time! Collect stars and upgrade different categories as: FUN, GRAPHICS, AUDIO and HUMOR.

I highly suggest to download the game as fullscreen does not work in web build!

This game includes such features as:

  • Jumping!
  • funy dialog, haha
  • a minor amount of tiny bugs enhancing the game experience!
  • A boss battle!
If this doesn’t convince you enough to play THE BEST LD GAME EVER! I Don’t know what will?! Controls
  • Moving: A D/Left Right
  • Jump: Space
  • Add stars: Space/Enter
  • Shoot: W / Up
  • Fullscreen: F / F11
  • Quit: Esc
:)
